mapper.insert:
SELECT wl_course_SEQ.nextval FROM dual
insert into wl_course (course_no,course_name,description,course_image,author) values(#{courseNo},#{courseName},#{description},#{courseImage},#{member.userId})
insert into wl_course_tag (course_no,tag) values((select Max(course_no) from wl_course),#{tags})
mapper.select: select course_no, course_name,description,course_image,author,c.reg_date,is_accept,cnt_good,activity,img_profile from wl_course c, wl_member m where c.AUTHOR=m.USER_ID and author=#{userId} and course_No=#{courseNo}
select tag from wl_course_tag where course_no=#{courseNo}

update.if: update wl_course set course_name=#{courseName} ,description=#{description},course_image=#{courseImage} where course_no=#{courseNo}
update wl_course set course_name=#{courseName} ,description=#{description} where course_no=#{courseNo}
